source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cowl of the Woodland Raccoon

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 98,429 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and opponent's failed interrupt attempts grant Precognition

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 98,429 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

 (1 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)
